alert.note: Alert for Conway; Southern Johnson County; Southern Pope County; Van Buren County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:09AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Johnson, west central Van Buren, western Conway and Pope Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 608 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dover, or 11 miles north of Russellville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Atkins... Pottsville... Dover... London... Hector... Happy Bend... Broomfield... Jerusalem... Taral... Petit Jean State Park... Lake Dardanelle... Appleton... Ada... Brock Creek Campground... Blackwell... Long Pool Campground... Pleasant Valley in Pope County... Economy... Caglesville... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Conway; Southern Johnson County; Southern Pope County; Van Buren County Higher Elevations
